name: EORM
overview: EORM (which stands for Environmental and Occupational Risk Management) knows that it’s in good form for consumers and employees to remain healthy and safe. The company provides Environmental, Health, Safety, and Sustainability (EHS&S) management and technical consulting services. It addresses issues such as ergonomics, environmental management, industrial hygiene, and occupational safety. The company also provides supplemental staff to help businesses implement and manage health and safety programs. EORM has historically targeted clients in California’s semiconductor industry, but has expanded to serve companies in a variety of industries and locations across the globe.
